name: lambda-oauth-sync
author: Michael Bausano <bausanomichal@gmail.com>
description: Twitter oauth resource which syncs user to the database.

scripts.create:stage: claudia create --name stage-oauth-sync --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::365488455739:role/lambda_basic_execution --config claudia-stage.json
scripts.create:prod: claudia create --name prod-oauth-sync --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::365488455739:role/lambda_basic_execution --config claudia-prod.json
